channel.title: Blind sql injection statement not understood
channel.description:
hello all ... im trying to inject since 3 days i did not found any exploit manually ... then i decided to scan it with acunetix ... it found a blind sql :D but with this statement
> * -1' OR 3*2*0=6 AND 000420=000420 or 'd59NL38O'=' => **FALSE** > * -1' OR 3*2*1=6 AND 000420=000420 or 'd59NL38O'=' => **TRUE**
what this mean ?? OR 3*2*1=6 and AND 000420=000420 and 'd59NL38O'=' ???? i did not understand anything ... can anyone explain

item.title: Blind sql injection statement not understood

item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

item.title: Blind sql injection statement not understood

item.description:
hello all …
im trying to inject since 3 days i did not found any exploit manually … then i decided to scan it with acunetix … it found a blind sql but with this statement

  • -1’ OR 320=6 AND 000420=000420 or ‘d59NL38O’=’ => FALSE
  • -1’ OR 321=6 AND 000420=000420 or ‘d59NL38O’=’ => TRUE

what this mean ??
OR 321=6
and
AND 000420=000420
and
‘d59NL38O’=’
??? i did not understand anything … can anyone explain
